snippet: Jordan criticized on Wednesday an Israeli plan to build a new international airport on the Red Sea, close to an existing one in Jordan.
abstract: Jordan criticizes an Israeli plan to build a new international airport on the Red Sea, close to an existing one in Jordan.
lead_paragraph: Jordan criticized on Wednesday an Israeli plan to build a new international airport on the Red Sea, close to an existing one in Jordan.

headline.main: Jordan: Criticism Over Israeli Plan for an Airport
headline.print_headline: Jordan: Criticism Over Israeli Plan for an Airport
